description: The main opposition figure calls for mass rallies as freed detainees speak of beatings in custody.
title: Belarus election: 'Widespread torture' inflicted on jailed protesters
title_page: Belarus election: 'Widespread torture' inflicted on jailed protesters - BBC News
maintext: Czech Prime Minister Andrej Babis said sanctions should be imposed "until free and transparent elections are held in Belarus with the participation of international observers". He said he had the support of Poland's Mateusz Morawiecki, who said he would put forward a "solidarity with Belarus" plan on Friday in the Polish parliament.
